vsParam: Hey, father. How are you lately?

Oh, Varerian.
You came just in time... Can you do me a favor?

Here's the thing...
There's an unidentified thief stealing things lately.

We've investigated some suspicious guys,
but we didn't find the real criminal.

Ah, I see.
That's why it's so tense in the town.

So you want us to find
the criminal?

Yeah, you are right.
We're relying on you.

Father, have you looked into the Calcus Graveyard?
The ghost there caused troubles earlier, right?

Ah? Yes, it happened before.
Is it possible that the ghost in the graveyard did this?

Yeah, if we can't find the criminal in town,
what I said could be possible, right?

Ha ha ha! I see. That didn't occur to me! You've become
cleverer after spending time with [px] and these guys.

Alright then. I want you to investigate the graveyard.
And if the criminal is there, tie it up and bring it back!

Tie it up...
Can we tie a ghost?

Not important. We don't come here often. Let's help him.
Right, [px]?

Sorry, [px]. I guess I have to trouble you guys.
Let's get prepared and go to the graveyard.
